    \lyquidity\xml\MS\IXmlSchemaInfo
    jump to top

    Package: Default
    Defines the post-schema-validation infoset of a validated XML node.

    Methods

    getIsDefault() : boolean

    Gets a value indicating if this validated XML node was set as the result of a default being applied during XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema validation.

    Returns
    TypeDescription
    booleantrue if this validated XML node was set as the result of a default being applied during schema validation; otherwise, false.
    getIsNil() : boolean

    Gets a value indicating if the value for this validated XML node is nil.

    Returns
    TypeDescription
    booleantrue if the value for this validated XML node is nil; otherwise, false.
    getMemberType() : \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaSimpleType

    Gets the dynamic schema type for this validated XML node.

    Returns
    TypeDescription
    \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaSimpleTypeAn XmlSchemaSimpleType object that represents the dynamic schema type for this validated XML node.
    getSchemaAttribute() : \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaAttribute

    Gets the compiled XmlSchemaAttribute that corresponds to this validated XML node.

    Returns
    TypeDescription
    \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaAttributeAn XmlSchemaAttribute that corresponds to this validated XML node.
    getSchemaElement() : \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaElement

    Gets the compiled XmlSchemaElement that corresponds to this validated XML node.

    Returns
    TypeDescription
    \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaElementAn XmlSchemaElement that corresponds to this validated XML node.
    getSchemaType() : \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaType

    Gets the static XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema type of this validated XML node.

    Returns
    TypeDescription
    \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaTypeAn XmlSchemaType of this validated XML node.
    getValidity() : \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaValidity

    Gets the XmlSchemaValidity value of this validated XML node.

    Returns
    TypeDescription
    \lyquidity\xml\MS\XmlSchemaValidityAn XmlSchemaValidity value of this validated XML node.
